name: propel22
description: Propel22 - Automated Joint Business Planning & Bookkeeping Platform

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.railway-build: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.render-build: npm run install-all && npm run build
